text: Faristenia quercivora is a moth in the family Gelechiidae. It is found in the Russian Far East, Korea and Japan (Honshu).Faristenia at funet The wingspan is 13.5–17 mm. The forewings are pale brownish grey, speckled with creamy white scales and with several irregularly scattered dark fuscous streaks. The hindwings are pale grey.Insecta koreana 10 : 34 The larvae feed on Quercus mongolica. ==References== Category:Faristenia Category:Moths described in 1991
title: Faristenia quercivora
